title: Textile, 1920–30
description: Polychrome block print on dark grey linen. Lattice of greens, brown vines and small flowers. Oval frames large cluster of flowers in red and pink roses, tulips, blue flowers. Clusters of flowers in one-half drop repeat, continuous lattice work.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-64.
